subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
These forms are seen in bronze inscriptions:
# {{Han compound|耂|疇|alt2=𢏚|ls=psc|t1=old|c1=s|c2=p}}.
# {{Han compound|耂|𠷎|ls=psc|t1=old|c1=s|c2=p}} ({{l|zh|𦓃}}).
# {{Han compound|耂|𠼡|ls=psc|t1=old|c1=s|c2=p}}.

The current traditional glyph is from the composition #3, with {{l|zh|又}} becoming {{l|zh|寸}} ({{Han compound|耂|𠾉}}).
